alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:08PM MST until January 07 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches for valleys, 3 to 6 inches for Marias Pass * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Polebridge, Marias Pass, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, and Essex. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
